title!

Function Keywords

ec::EChart
text::AbstractString
subtext::AbstractString
x::Int
y::Int

Examples

using ECharts
x = 1:20
y = 3 .+ 5x
a = bar(x = x, y = y)
title!(a, text = "Bar Plot Title", subtext = "Secondary Title")
